data.json_data: {"surveys":{"question1":{"question":"Which of the following anti-diabetic medication would you suggest along with Metformin to maintain target glycated haemoglobin levels in patients with type 2 diabetes ?","questionImageURL":"","type":"single","correctoption":"","point":"0","disclaimer":"","usercomment_flag":"0","options":[{"label":"Metformin + Glargine","value":0},{"label":"Metformin + Liraglutide","value":1},{"label":"Metformin + Glimepiride","value":2},{"label":"Metformin + Sitagliptin","value":3}]},"question2":{"question":"In your opinion, which of these anti-diabetic medications is most likely to cause severe hypoglycaemic episodes?","questionImageURL":"","type":"single","correctoption":"","point":"0","disclaimer":"","usercomment_flag":"0","options":[{"label":"Glimepiride","value":0},{"label":"Glargine","value":1},{"label":"Liraglutide","value":2},{"label":"Sitagliptin","value":3}]},"question3":{"question":"According to you, which of these anti- diabetic medications is most likely to induce gastrointestinal side effects ?","questionImageURL":"","type":"single","correctoption":"","point":"0","disclaimer":"","usercomment_flag":"0","options":[{"label":"Glimepiride","value":0},{"label":"Glargine","value":1},{"label":"Liraglutide","value":2},{"label":"Sitagliptin","value":3}]}}}
